title: Instant Coffee Cake with Coffee Sauce
ingredients: ['Coffee cake', '100g caster sugar', '100g butter', '2 eggs, beaten', '2 tbsp instant coffee dissolved in 2 tbsp of water', '100g self raising flour', 'Syrup', '100ml water', '1 tbsp coffee', '4 tbsp sugar', 'Coffee sauce', '50g caster sugar', '1 tbsp instant coffee', '3 tbsp golden syrup', '50ml water', '125ml evaporated milk']
